text: what's up guys from Rome Italy yes
that's right I am in the beautiful city
of Rome for the third time you might be
wondering why I'm here and it's a bit
unexpected for me actually to be honest
but I am here for one reason only and
that is to get specific visas for some
upcoming trips which I am NOT able to
get them at home in Washington DC so I'm
able to get them here in Rome Italy
unfortunately I can't let you know which
visas these are because their surprise
trips which I'm going on very soon but
I'm basically making this video to let
you know that I'll be taking a week off
seven days from posting videos it's one
of the longest times I've gone without
posting in the last few years but I'm
doing this for a few reasons a to
protect my safety and B so I don't have
to stress about uploading videos every
day especially when the Wi-Fi signals
will not be very strong I can fully
enjoy these upcoming trips and I can
promise you with all my heart that I am
going to be making the best stories the
most eye-opening stories incredible
people's stories for you guys all to see
so I hope you guys enjoyed my recent
trip across West Africa well Central and
West Africa over the last month and a
half I'll be taking a two-week break
from Africa doing some other countries
and then I will be heading back into
Central Africa for countries there
before completing the rest of the year
to be honest with you guys it's quite
stressful to travel and make videos
every day especially in some countries
where the Wi-Fi is not so friendly or
you know it's challenging both
physically and mentally to do it but I
really try my best and I'm this is not
me complaining I really like to be the
person to go travel places and be that
messenger and show you guys a story
because honestly I get more satisfaction
of being able to document something and
tell you that just from me seeing it
with my own eyes and this is a common
question I get like Oh drew now you
really enjoying the places are you just
shooting and yeah I'm enjoying it
completely and I think I enjoy in a
different way than someone who just
completely unplugs and sits on a beach
and I
listen to the sound of the waves all day
and that's great everyone has their own
way of enjoying things but for me I like
to go nose deep tell the story edit the
video all night and share with you guys
it's just very very tedious and
time-consuming but I love it and that's
the reason why I do what I do that's it
guys I'm gonna keep this very short and
sweet so if you don't hear from me for
about a week don't worry everything's
fine I'm just busy traveling I'm still
making videos which I'll post after that
is it have a great day from Rome Italy
see you guys later
